revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Askey |model=RTW030 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/07/2002 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=H8N-RTW030V1 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Virata |cpu1_model=Nitrogen 210-80 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Askey WLC032 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C502A |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Kendin |sw_model=KS8995E |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=schematics |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=IEEE 802.11 LAN |default_ssid_regex=^IEEE 802.11 LAN$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} "3028-000051" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :"RF&WIRELESS DIV.", "3017-000380", "WLC032", "03.15.02" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
Per FCC ID GX5-2105, the '''Broadxent''' 2105 is a rebranded RTW030.
The schematics state the device uses the Helium 210-80, 2MB '''AMD''' Am29LV160DB Flash, and 2x 8MB RAM chips. 10Mbit WAN w/ RTL8019AS.
Default credentials and SSID are from the FCC submitted manual. The OUI for the device probably includes 00:90:96.
